defs: = ಕಿವುಡುಗೊಳ್.
(in comp.) deafness.
(used to modify the verb 'squeeze') as to make something shapeless.
to trample as render something shapeless.

being in the first or an early stage of life; young; not matured.

the part of the arm between the elbow and the wrist; the fore-arm.
the length of the arm from the end of the middle finger to the elbow, an ancient unit of linear measure of 18 to 22 inches (45.4 to 55.5 cm.); a cubit.

(Jain.) a measure of two cubits (about 36 to 44 inches or 90.8 to 111.0 cm.) 4) the distance between from the tip of the small finger to the tip of the thumb when stretched apart, used as a unit of liner measure.

the plant Sida cordifolia (= S. caroubufikua) of Malvaceae family; country mallow.

(talking, laughing, etc.) without thinking; suddenly.
